import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Membership.css'; const Membership = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ surname: '', name: '', otherName: '', homeAddress: '', dob: '', townCity: '', localGovt: '', passportId: '', codiceFiscale: '', phone: '', nextOfKinName: '', nextOfKinPhone: '', nextOfKinAddress: '', nextOfKinCity: '', nextOfKinCountry: '', isMarried: '', partnerName: '', childrenCount: '', childrenNames: '', parentsStatus: '', association: '', criminalRecord: '', reason: '', agreement: false, passportPhoto: null, }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked, files } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : type === 'file' ? files[0] : value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // TODO: Implement form submission logic }; return (
